description: Notes

name: Home Teleport
description: Transports the caster to one of the lodestones. Locations can be found on the Lodestone Network page. It takes around 10 seconds to cast, gives no experience, and is interruptible by combat. Not useful at all as an Emergency teleport, but will suffice as a no cost teleport in a peaceful situation.

name: Air Strike
description: Maximum of 48 damage per cast.

name: Confuse
description: Reduces the target's chance to hit by 5% for 1 minute.

name: Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Opal)
description: Enchants opal tipped bolts.

name: Water Strike
description: Maximum of 48 damage per cast.

name: Lvl-1 Enchant
description: Enchants sapphire and opal jewellery.

name: Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Sapphire)
description: Enchants sapphire tipped bolts.

name: Earth Strike
description: Maximum of 86 damage per cast.

name: Mobilising Armies Teleport
description: Teleport yourself to the Mobilising Armies command centre.

name: Weaken
description: Reduces the target's damage dealt by 5% for 1 minute.

name: Fire Strike
description: Maximum of 125 damage per cast.

name: Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Jade)
description: Enchants jade tipped bolts.

name: Bones to Bananas
description: Converts all bones in inventory into bananas.

name: Air Bolt
description: Maximum of 163 damage per cast, previously 120 damage with chaos gauntlets.

name: Curse
description: Increases the target's damage received by 5% for 1 minute.

name: Bind
description: Prevents creatures from moving for 20 seconds, or players for 10 seconds.

name: Low Alchemy
description: Converts items into coins, equal to the value if the item was sold at a General Store.

name: Water Bolt
description: Maximum of 221 damage per cast, previously 130 damage with chaos gauntlets.

name: Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Pearl)
description: Enchants pearl tipped bolts.

name: Varrock Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the centre of Varrock, by the fountain near the shop. Players who have completed easy Varrock Tasks may teleport to the south entrance of the Grand Exchange instead.

name: Lvl-2 Enchant
description: Enchants emerald and jade jewellery.

name: Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Emerald)
description: Enchants emerald tipped bolts.

name: Earth Bolt
description: Maximum of 278 damage per cast, previously 140 damage with chaos gauntlets.

name: Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Red Topaz)
description: Enchants red topaz tipped bolts.

name: Lumbridge Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the centre of Lumbridge Castle.

name: Bounty Teleport
description: Transports the caster to their Bounty Hunter target. Players must unlock this spell from the Bounty Hunter & Deathmatch Reward Shop before using it.

name: Telekinetic grab
description: Grabs an item off the ground without need for directly taking it.

name: Fire Bolt
description: Maximum of 336 damage per cast, previously 150 damage with chaos gauntlets.

name: Falador Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the centre of Falador, next to the statue of Saradomin.

name: House Teleport
description: Transports the caster to his or her player-owned house.

name: Air Blast
description: Maximum of 394 damage per cast.

name: Superheat Item
description: Smelts ores without the need for a furnace. The chance of smelting iron ore increases to 100%.

name: Camelot Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the entrance of the castle at Camelot.

name: Water Blast
description: Maximum of 451 damage per cast.

name: Lvl-3 Enchant
description: Enchants ruby and topaz jewellery.

name: Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Ruby)
description: Enchants ruby tipped bolts.

name: Slayer Dart
description: Maximum damage of 480 per cast. Used to harm Turoths and Kurasks.

name: Smoke Rush
description: Maximum damage of 480 per cast. Reduces the target's chance to hit by 5% for 10 seconds.

name: Snare
description: Prevents creatures from moving for 30 seconds, or players for 15 seconds.

name: Ardougne Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the marketplace in East Ardougne in the centre of the square. Completion of Plague City is required to use Ardougne Teleport.

name: Shadow Rush
description: Maximum damage of 499 per cast. Reduces the target's damage dealt by 5% for 10 seconds.

name: Earth Blast
description: Maximum of 509 damage per cast.

name: Paddewwa Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the entrance of Edgeville Dungeon.

name: High Alchemy
description: Converts items into more coins than Low Level Alchemy, equal to the value if the item was sold at a Specialty Shop: ie The Sword Shop in Varrock.

name: Blood Rush
description: Maximum of 538 damage per cast. Heal the caster for 5% of the damage inflicted on the target.

name: Charge Water Orb
description: When cast at the Water Obelisk, this spell turns an unpowered orb into a water orb.

name: Lvl-4 Enchant
description: Enchants diamond jewellery.

name: Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Diamond)
description: Enchants diamond tipped bolts.

name: Ice Rush
description: Maximum of 557 damage per cast. Immobilises the target for 10 seconds, or 2.4 seconds for players.

name: Watchtower Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the top of the Watchtower. Completion of the Watchtower quest is required to use this spell.

name: Fire Blast
description: Maximum of 566 damage per cast. Strongest offensive magic spell available to free players.

name: Bones to Peaches
description: Converts all bones in inventory to peaches. Players must unlock this spell at the Mage Training Arena before using it.

name: Divine Storm
description: A powerful air spell, dealing up to 576 damage per cast.

name: Charge Earth Orb
description: When cast at the Earth Obelisk, this spell turns an unpowered orb into an earth orb.

name: Senntisten Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the Digsite.

name: Trollheim Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the very top of Trollheim, near Eadgar's cave. Completion of Eadgar's Ruse is required to use this spell.

name: God Wars Dungeon Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the snowy area before the God Wars Dungeon entrance. Completion of The Mighty Fall is required to use this spell.

name: Smoke Burst
description: Maximum of 595 damage per cast and hits a 3x3 area surrounding the target. Reduces the targets' chance to hit by 5% for 10 seconds

name: Air Wave
description: Maximum of 595 damage per cast.

name: Charge Fire Orb
description: When cast at the Fire Obelisk, this spell turns an unpowered orb into a fire orb.

name: Shadow Burst
description: Maximum of 614 damage per cast and hits a 3x3 area surrounding the target. Reduces the targets' damage dealt by 5% for 10 seconds.

name: Teleport Ape Atoll
description: Transports the caster to Ape Atoll. Partial completion of Recipe for Disaster is required to use this spell.

name: Bake Pie
description: Bakes all uncooked pies in the caster's inventory. One set of runes is required for each pie.

name: Water Wave
description: Maximum of 624 damage per cast.

name: Charge Air Orb
description: When cast at the Air Obelisk, this spell turns an unpowered orb into an air orb.

name: Cure Plant
description: Cures a diseased plant.

name: Kharyrll Teleport
description: Transports the caster to Canifis. This spell is the only Ancient Magicks teleport spell that can be used in a portal room of a player-owned house.

name: Vulnerability
description: Increases the target's damage received by 10% for 1 minute.

name: Monster Examine
description: Casting this on a monster produces the following information: Combat level, life points, maximum hit and whether it can be a Slayer assignment.

name: NPC Contact
description: Allows remote contact with Slayer masters and some other NPCs.

name: Blood Burst
description: Maximum of 653 damage per cast and hits a 3x3 area surrounding the target. Heals the caster for 5% of the damage inflicted on the targets.

name: Cure Other
description: Cures another player of poison.

name: Lvl-5 Enchant
description: Enchants dragonstone jewellery.

name: Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Dragonstone)
description: Enchants dragonstone tipped bolts.

name: Humidify
description: Fills all empty water-carrying vessels (such as vials and buckets) in the caster's inventory with water, excluding some quest-specific vessels.

name: Moonclan Teleport
description: Teleports the caster to Moonclan Island.

name: Mazcab Teleport
description: Teleports the caster to Mazcab.

name: Earth Wave
description: Maximum of 672 damage per cast.

name: Ice Burst
description: Maximum of 672 damage per cast and hits a 3x3 area surrounding the target. Immobilising the targets for 10 seconds, or 4.8 seconds for players

name: Tele-group Moonclan
description: Transports the caster, along with up to 4 other players (with Accept Aid on), to Moonclan Island.

name: Ourania Teleport
description: Transports the caster outside the cave with the Ourania Runecrafting Altar

name: Cure Me
description: Cures the caster of poison.

name: Hunter Kit
description: Gives the caster a noose wand, a butterfly net, a bird snare, a rabbit snare, a teasing stick, an unlit torch, and a box trap.

name: Lassar Teleport
description: Teleports the caster to the top of Ice Mountain.

name: Waterbirth Teleport
description: Transports the caster to Waterbirth Island.

name: South Falador Teleport
description: Teleports the caster to the southern gate of Falador. Unlocked at the Livid Farm.

name: Enfeeble
description: Lowers the target's damage dealt by 10% for 1 minute.

name: Tele-group Waterbirth
description: Transports the caster, along with up to 4 other players (who have Accept Aid on), to Waterbirth Island.

name: Cure Group
description: Cures up to 4 target players of poison.

name: Smoke Blitz
description: Maximum damage of 710 per cast. Reduces the target's chance to hit by 5% for 10 seconds.

name: Tele-other Lumbridge
description: Transports another player (who has Accept Aid switched on) to Lumbridge.

name: Barbarian Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the Barbarian Outpost.

name: Opal Aurora
description: Maximum of 720 damage per cast. Increases the lifespan of prisms.

name: Fire Wave
description: Maximum of 720 damage per cast.

name: Stat Spy
description: Casting this on another player allows the caster to see the target's combat and non-combat stats, along with whether or not any stats have been boosted or reduced.

name: Repair Rune Pouch
description: Cast on an essence pouch. Pouch is repaired and will take 5 times longer to deteriorate. Unlocked at Livid Farm.

name: Tele-group Barbarian
description: Transports the caster, along with up to 4 other players (who have Accept Aid on), to the Barbarian Outpost.

name: North Ardougne Teleport
description: Teleports the caster to the end of the pathway found north of East Ardougne's bank. Unlocked at Livid Farm.

name: Shadow Blitz
description: Maximum of 729 damage per cast. Reduces the target's damage dealt by 5% for 10 seconds.

name: Prism of Restoration
description: Places a prism which heals nearby familiars and restores their special attack energy, and gives a chance to not use scrolls on familiar special ability use.

name: Storm of Armadyl
description: Maximum of 739 damage per cast.

name: Intercept
description: Redirects damage taken by the targeted player over the next three seconds to the caster, and reduces the damage to 95% of the original hit.

name: Sapphire Aurora
description: Maximum of 739 damage per cast. Overcharges prisms, giving them extra effects for their next activation.

name: Superglass Make
description: Converts all sand and soda ash (or seaweed) in the caster's inventory into molten glass.

name: Dareeyak Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the western ruins in the Wilderness.

name: Khazard Teleport
description: Transports the caster to Port Khazard.

name: Remote Farm
description: Allows the status of farming patches in RuneScape to be viewed and, if a patch is diseased, it allows you to cure them. Unlocked at Livid Farm.

name: Entangle
description: Prevents creatures from moving for 40 seconds, or players for 20 seconds.

name: Emerald Aurora
description: Maximum of 758 damage per cast. Applies a stacking 1% damage reduction buff to the caster. Stacks up to 5%, and with other damage reduction methods.

name: Tele-group Khazard
description: Transports the caster, along with up to 4 other players (who have Accept Aid on), to Port Khazard.

name: Dream
description: This spell puts the caster into a "sleep" state, during which life points regenerate at twice their usual rate. Any activity except talking will "awaken" the caster.

name: Polypore Strike
description: Theoretical maximum of 768 damage per cast, but is limited to 720 due to the Polypore staff being a level 75 weapon.

name: Blood Blitz
description: Maximum of 786 damage per cast. Heals the caster for 5% of the damage inflicted on the target.

name: Prism of Salvation
description: Places a prism which players can click to teleport near to, as long as there's a clear path between.

name: Stagger
description: Reduces the target's chance to hit by 10% for 1 minute.

name: String Jewellery
description: Strings all unstrung amulets in the caster's inventory.

name: Spiritualise Food
description: Cast on a food. This will heal your familiar and boost its stats. Unlocked at Livid Farm.

name: Stat Restore Pot Share
description: This spell can target up to 4 other players. Each target receives a dose of a restoration potion (such as a prayer potion) from the caster's inventory.

name: Air Surge
description: Maximum of 768 damage per cast.

name: Ruby Aurora
description: Maximum of 777 damage per cast. Has a chance to apply a 1% damage buff to nearby allies. Stacks up to 3%.

name: Ice Blitz
description: Maximum of 786 damage per cast. Immobilises the target for 10 seconds, or 7.2 seconds for players.

name: Prism of Loyalty
description: Places a prism into which players can funnel life points. Anyone doing so will take damage, and the prism will automatically heal nearby players with 25% or lower life points.

name: Magic Imbue
description: Allows combination of runes without the need for a talisman for a short time.

name: Tele-other Falador
description: Transports another player (who has Accept Aid switched on) to Falador.

name: Fertile Soil
description: Treats a farming patch with supercompost.

name: Make Leather
description: Lets the player tan up to 5 hides per cast. Unlocked at Livid Farm.

name: Boost Potion Share
description: Has the same effect as Stat Restore Pot Share, except with a potion that boosts a stat (such as a strength potion).

name: Shield dome
description: Deploys a static dome that allies can stand within to reduce incoming damage by 50%. Domes cannot be layered on top of each other, and new shield domes affecting a player within 2 minutes have diminishing returns.

name: Carrallanger Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the graveyard in the Wilderness.

name: Teleport Block
description: Blocks target from teleporting

name: Fishing Guild Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the Fishing Guild.

name: Water Surge
description: Maximum of 768 damage per cast.

name: Smoke Barrage
description: Maximum of 786 damage per cast and hits a 3x3 area surrounding the target. Reduces the targets' chance to hit by 5% for 10 seconds

name: Prism of Dowsing
description: Places a prism which attracts wisps to it and increases the chance of drawing enriched wisps. All nearby players can benefit from this.

name: Tele-group Fishing Guild
description: Transports the caster, along with up to 4 other players (who have Accept Aid turned on) to the Fishing Guild.

name: Plank Make
description: Transforms one log in the caster's inventory into a plank of the appropriate type. Like the Sawmill, coins are still required to convert logs, but less than if the logs had been taken to the Sawmill.

name: Catherby Teleport
description: Transports the caster to Catherby.

name: Tune Bane Ore
description: Tunes bane ore against a specific creature.

name: Lvl-6 Enchant
description: Enchants onyx, alchemical onyx and hydrix jewellery.

name: Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Onyx)
description: Enchants onyx tipped bolts.

name: Crystallise
description: When cast on mining, fishing or woodcutting spots - or full box traps - will cause the resource to persist for 30 seconds, yield no resources and give increased XP rounded to 50%. Other players may still deplete the resource, but Crystallise will carry on when the resource is back.

name: Rapid Growth
description: Skips a tree, fruit tree, or herb patch forward a growth stage. Usable once per day on each eligible farming location.

name: Shadow Barrage
description: Maximum of 786 damage per cast and hits a 3x3 area surrounding the target. Reduces the targets' damage dealt by 5% for 10 seconds

name: Tele-group Catherby
description: Transports the caster, and up to 4 other players (who have Accept Aid on), to Catherby.

name: Ice Plateau Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the Ice Plateau in level 53 Wilderness.

name: Annakarl Teleport
description: Transports the caster to the Demonic Ruins in the Wilderness.

name: Tele-other Camelot
description: Transports another player (who has Accept Aid switched on) to Camelot.

name: Tele-group Ice Plateau
description: Transports the caster, along with up to 4 other players (who have Accept Aid on), to the Ice Plateau in level 53 Wilderness.

name: Disruption Shield
description: Nullifies the next hit you receive from another player. Only works on other players. Unlocked at Livid Farm.

name: Crystal Mask
description: Gives +15% to pickpocketing chance and gives a chance to avoid damage and stun on failure for 5 minutes.

name: Earth Surge
description: Maximum of 768 damage per cast.

name: Blood Barrage
description: Maximum of 786 damage per cast and hits a 3x3 area surrounding the target. Heals the caster for 5% of the damage inflicted on the targets.

name: Heal Other
description: This spell damages the caster for 75% of their current life points and heals another target player the same amount.

name: Trollheim Teleport (Lunar)
description: Teleports the caster to Trollheim. Unlocked at the Livid Farm. Completion of My Arm's Big Adventure is required to use this spell.

name: Vengeance Other
description: Another target player receives the "Vengeance" effect. The next time another player or an NPC attacks that player, the attacking player or NPC is dealt damage, up to 75% of the damage that player or NPC's first attack dealt.

name: Tele-group Trollheim
description: Transports the caster, along with players in a 3x3 area around them (with Accept Aid on), who have completed My Arm's Big Adventure), to Trollheim. Unlocked at the Livid Farm. Completion of My Arm's Big Adventure is required to cast this spell.

name: Ice Barrage
description: Maximum of 786 damage per cast and hits a 3x3 area surrounding the target. Immobilises the targets for 10 seconds, or 9.6 seconds for players.

name: Vengeance
description: The caster receives the "Vengeance" effect. The next time a player or NPC attacks the caster, that player or NPC takes up to 75% of the damage their attack dealt.

name: Fire Surge
description: Maximum of 768 damage per cast.

name: Heal Group
description: Damages the caster for 75% of their current life points and distributes the lost life points among all other players within a 3x3 grid of the caster.

name: Vengeance Group
description: Casts Vengeance on up to 50 players within a 7x7 square around the caster. When activated, all players around the caster with accept aid on receive the effect of vengeance. Unlocked at Livid Farm.

name: Ghorrock Teleport
description: Transports the caster to Ice Plateau in the Wilderness.

name: Spellbook Swap
description: Enables the caster to cast a single spell from any other spellbook.

name: Borrowed Power
description: Enables the caster to cast selected spells from the standard spellbook, while wearing an Arcane capacitor necklace charged with the runes for this spell. Unlocked at Livid Farm.
